required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on June 04, 2014
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Relative Bioavailability of a Single Dose of Nintedanib Given Alone and in Combination With Multiple Doses of Rifampicin
clinical_study.official_title: Relative Bioavailability of a Single Oral Dose of Nintedanib Given Alone and in Combination With Multiple Oral Doses of Rifampicin in Healthy Male Volunteers (an Open-label, Two-period, Fixed Sequence Phase I Trial)

oversight_info.authority: Germany: Federal Institute for Drugs and Medical Devices
United States: Food and Drug Administration

brief_summary.textblock: To investigate the effect of the P-gp inducer rifampicin on the pharmacokinetic parameters of nintedanib

clinical_study.study_design: Allocation: Non-Randomized, Endpoint Classification: Safety Study, Intervention Model: Single Group Assignment, Masking: Open Label, Primary Purpose: Treatment

primary_outcome.measure: AUC0-infinity (area under the concentration-time curve of the analyte in plasma over the time interval from 0 extrapolated to infinity) of nintedanib
Cmax (maximum measured concentration of the analyte in plasma) of nintedanib

secondary_outcome.measure: AUC0-tz (area under the concentration-time curve of the analyte in plasma over the time interval from 0 to the last quantifiable drug plasma concentration) of nintedanib

arm_group.description: multiple doses of Rifampicin + single dose of Nintedanib

intervention.description: single dose once daily for 7 days

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion criteria:
1. Healthy male subjects
Exclusion criteria:
1. Any relevant deviation from healthy conditions
